Package com.textmagic.sms.core.parsing

Interface Summary
TextMagicResponseParser TextMagicResponseParser is parser of TextMagic Gateway Http API response Class provides a set of methods for parsing responses of all gateway commands
 

Class Summary
RawResponseTextConverter Currently the TextMagic gateway, in case of sms body being encoded in Unicode, http api represents it as "\\uXXXX\\uXXXX\..." codes.
TextMagicJSONResponseParser The default TextMagicResponseParser implementation.
 

Exception Summary
ResponseParsingException Class ResponseParsingException is a form of Exception that indicates that a parsing of TextMagic server response failed
